docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: INTERNATIONAL A2-10 The leaders of Lithuania marshaled their meager police force to protect government and communications centers after Soviet troops seized army deserters and secured the Communist headquarters. Page A1

headline.main: To Allow Smoking in Cockpits Is No Way to Treat Addiction
